name: PLYR PHI
description: PLYR Network is a blockchain gaming platform that integrates a multi-chain ecosystem for developers and gamers. It offers staking, gaming clusters, and opportunities for asset management, supporting decentralized game economies. With a focus on seamless gaming experiences, it aims to redefine Web3 gaming. PLYR supports tools for developers to enhance game creation and distribution.

chains.name: PLYRPHI
chains.description: The PLYR gaming chain offers low-cost, fast, and secure transactions for gaming. It enables seamless in-game purchases, asset transfers, and integrates with over 200 networks, providing a robust foundation for innovative and cross-chain gaming experiences.
